main event: On May 9, 1966, a resident of Norwood, Ohio observed a red light that disappeared behind trees.
interesting points: The object was seen for a total duration of 5 minutes., The observer compared the speed of the UFO to that of lighted aircraft., The conditions of the sighting were cloudy, with the time being recorded by eyeing and elapsed clock., The observer noted that the object disappeared while they were watching it., The witness reported seeing the bright object at night.
witness description: a calm male pilot and observer associated with Civil Air Patrol, 75 years old
